name: A Friendly Dig
description:
Hey everyone! Thanks for checking out my entry to Ludum Dare 48, theme Deeper and Deeper. I wanted to try and keep the jam short, only a few hours each day, but I had to go over the 2 days for compo and do some on the Monday. 

The game was made with the Godot Game Engine, and in a total of about 16 hours of work. All visuals, music, sound effects, programming, and design by me! Connor! Also known on Github as Chillen and Twitter as ChillenLD.

I know it's definitely rough around the edges, and I didn't quite get the gameplay loop fleshed out, but I'm pretty happy with the result as a toy at least. If you do like it, I'd love to hear!
